headline: Is Brown & Brown Attractively Priced After Recent Specialty Insurance Expansion?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Brown & Brown is a bargain or a value trap at around $79.96, this breakdown will help you decide without getting lost in the noise. The stock is down about 1.2% over the last week and 0.4% over the past month, and while year to date it has slipped roughly 20.5% and about 22.5% over the last year, the longer term picture still shows gains of 42.2% over three years and 79.7% over five. Recent headlines have focused on Brown & Brown expanding its specialty...
